dropzone.hint: Select or drag & drop your file (ZIP only).
dropzone.invalidFile: Oh Dang! You picked a falsy file. Please pick the ZIP-File you downloaded from Twitter directly without touching it.

introduction.title: Your Private Twitter Archive Viewer
introduction.description: This tool helps you explore and organize your Twitter archive locally - completely private and secure.
features: Search and filter your tweets, replies, and threads
Export filtered results as JSON or CSV
Share tweets to other platforms (Bluesky, Mastodon, Threads)
100% local processing - no server uploads, your data stays private
Best performance with archives under 2 GB

export.includeMediaDescription: Adds images, videos, and GIFs to export packages.

filterDescriptions.all: You are now seeing all tweets, including replies, retweets, and original tweets.
filterDescriptions.tweets: You are now seeing only original tweets (no replies or retweets).
filterDescriptions.replies: You are now seeing only replies to other tweets.
filterDescriptions.retweets: You are now seeing only retweets.
filterDescriptions.threads: You are now seeing only threads with multiple connected tweets.
filterDescriptions.media: You are now seeing only tweets that include media attachments.
filterDescriptions.mediaImages: You are now seeing only tweets that include images.
filterDescriptions.mediaVideos: You are now seeing only tweets that include videos or GIFs.

content.notFound: No tweets found by given search term: {0}
content.allLoaded: You've reached the end! All tweets loaded.

share.title: Share
share.mastodonReminder: Text copied! Paste it into your Mastodon instance.
